title: Altar/Locations

properties.value: This list only lists non-construction altars which can be used to recharge prayer points

content:
This list only lists non-construction altars which can be used to recharge prayer points


Altar locations[edit | edit source]

Name Location Members God Maplink Comments
Chaos Altar South-east Varrock 1
 Maplink Has a "Check" option.
Chaos Altar Underground Pass 1
 Maplink
Chaos Altar Ourania Cave entrance 1
 Maplink
Chaos Altar Wilderness Chaos Temple 0
 Maplink
Chaos Altar Black Knight's Fortress 0
 Maplink
Chaos Altar Chaos Temple near Goblin Village 0
 Maplink
Chaos Altar Deep wilderness Chaos Temple 0
 Maplink Can offer bones for 3.5 times the prayer experience, and a 50% chance to not consume the bone.
Chaos Altar Yanille Agility dungeon 1
 Maplink Praying here opens a trapdoor.
Altar Tutorial Island 0
 Maplink
Altar Lumbridge church 0
 Maplink
Altar Between Rimmington, Port Sarim and Thurgo 0
 Maplink
Altar Duel Arena lobby 0
 Maplink
Altar Varrock Palace 0
 Maplink
Altar Seers' Village 1
 Maplink
Altar East Ardougne 1
 Maplink
Altar West Ardougne 1
 Maplink
Altar Ardougne Monastery 1
 Maplink Features two altars in the same building.
Altar Paterdomus 1
 Maplink
Altar Entrana 1
 Maplink Plays a role in Devious Minds quest
Altar Edgeville Monastery 0
 Maplink Requires 31 prayer, boosts prayer to 2 points above the normal maximum.
Altar Well of Voyage 1
 Maplink
Altar Lletya 1
 Maplink
Altar Tower of Voices 1
 Maplink
Altar Prifddinas 1
 Maplink
Altar Gorlah 1
 Maplink
Altar North-eastern Varrock 0
 Maplink
Altar Kourend Castle 1
 Maplink Pray instead of Pray-at.
Altar Witchaven 1
 Maplink Pray instead of Pray-at.
Altar Camelot 1
 Maplink
Altar Heroes' Guild 1
 Maplink
Altar Sophanem 1
 Maplink Requires access to Sophanem.
Altar Hosidius' church 1
 Maplink Pray instead of Pray-at.
Altar Hosidius monk's camp 1
 Maplink Pray instead of Pray-at.
Altar Arceuus church 1
 None Maplink
Altar Lovakengj 1
 Unknown Maplink Pray instead of Pray-at.
Altar Molch 1
 Maplink
Altar Xeric's Shrine in Kebos Swamp 1
 Maplink
Altar Myths' Guild 1
 Unknown Maplink Requires completion of Dragon Slayer II.
Altar Forthos Dungeon 1
 Maplink Becomes cursed when fighting Olbertus, drains prayer & deals damage when cursed.
Altar Ferox Enclave 0
 Maplink
Altar Citharede Abbey on Desert Plateau 0
 Maplink Pray instead of Pray-at.
Altar Clan Hall chapel 0
 None Requires access to Clan Hall.
Altar of Guthix Taverley stone circle 1
 Maplink Looks like a Dolmen.
Altar of nature Nature grotto in Mort Myre Swamp 1
 Maplink Requires completion of Nature Spirit, gives 2 extra prayer points.
Zamorak Altar God Wars Dungeon 1
 Maplink Has a Teleport option to exit the boss room. Gives extra prayer points for Zamorak equipment.
Saradomin Altar God Wars Dungeon 1
 Maplink Has a Teleport option to exit the boss room. Gives extra prayer points for Saradomin equipment.
Armadyl Altar God Wars Dungeon 1
 Maplink Has a Teleport option to exit the boss room. Gives extra prayer points for Armadyl equipment.
Bandos Altar God Wars Dungeon 1
 Maplink Has a Teleport option to exit the boss room. Gives extra prayer points for Bandos equipment.
Altar God Wars Dungeon 1
 Maplink Has a Teleport option to exit the boss room. If Zaros equipment is worn, also restores hitpoints, run energy, and special attack energy, plus extra prayer points.
Altar Shade Catacombs 1
 Unknown Maplink Requires bleached bones for prayer restore.
Altar of Zamorak Slepe church 1
 Maplink
Broken sun altar Forthos dungeon 1
 Maplink Changed praying animation when Knight of Varlamore is there after the In Search of Knowledge quest.
Shrine Woodcutting Guild 1
 Evil Chicken Maplink Offering bird's eggs gives prayer xp and can give evil chicken outfit.
Tribal Statue Tai Bwo Wannai 1
 Karamjan gods Maplink Requires completion of Tai Bwo Wannai Trio.
Statue Darkmeyer 1
 Unknown Maplink Drains hitpoints in return for restoring prayer points.
Gorilla Statue Temple of Marimbo 1
 Maplink One altar on each floor.
Elidinis Statuette Nardah 1
 Maplink Requires completion of the Spirits of the Elid quest. Also restores run and special attack and boosts hitpoints.
